description: A wine bar-cum-osteria with a warm, rustic decor and a menu offering fish and meat dishes, including specialities such as fried scampi, squid, crayfish and vegetables, all seasoned with olive oil. There’s also a good choice of wines by the glass, with a focus on natural wines.
